website_summaries.verdict: Bounces into first place with its tough construction, cute design, and wide variety of sizes that the whole family can enjoy.
pros: Thick walls can take a beating from energetic kids
Neutral color and emoji print is suitable for boys and girls
Available in multiple sizes for all age groups, including adults
cons: Lack of instructions left some owners guessing

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my nephew who just turned 8. I went with the teenager size because he is taller and stalkier than the average 8 year old. He absolutely loves it and so far it is holding up. I had gotten his little sister one for her birthday last July, it is also from Waliki and has held up very good.
customer_reviews.author: Paula G

customer_reviews.title: Great product, only 1 con.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It gives me great childhood flash backs when I see my daughter hoping around. She really love this thing and never wants to get off of it. The only negative thing I have to say is that it pick up dirt reallll easy and fast! Other than that, its great especially right now when your trying to be more cautious with going outside so much and they need to burn off energy while indoors. I cannot reccomend this enoughh!! Will be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia cruz

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love!
customer_reviews.text: This ended up being the kids favorite Christmas gift! It was a last minute addition that I am so happy I got. Its great for cabin fever...where the kids have alot of energy but don't have many options in the winter to release it! I love that there are different size options for each age! My daughter and son both have their own size and they bounce for hours! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: mona

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it looks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two different hopping balls for my kids. When I open and inflate the ball, it was much smaller than I was expecting. Thought my son would use the handle, but he doesn’t even hold on to it. Sometimes I wonder if I should bought a small exercise ball as it would be similar or cheaper price and I could get some use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucius

customer_reviews.title: Funny!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 12 of these Waliki Hopper Balls--two of each size in different colors for each separate age group from 3 to 101! They were in constant demand and everyone had a great time riding them or just laughing at others who did. Lots of spills, zero injuries! Great exercise, great fun! So worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnea

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old's birthday. He is a very active kid and needs a way to use his energy. This is perfect for him. I love that it's something he can do inside with winter coming. The teenager size is perfect for him, the child size would have been too small. He's average sized for his age.
customer_reviews.author: TINA N YEAGLEY

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large ball for my 4 year old grand daughter, and just inflated it smaller. It is perfect for her. She has been hopping for at least an hour a day. I plan on getting more of these for gifts. Children need more exercise, and they might as well have fun getting it!
customer_reviews.author: 1sunny1

customer_reviews.title: Absolute favorite in this house - great color - easy to blow up - sturdy and lots of bounce.
customer_reviews.text: Has to buy this one for my grandson who just turned 7. His sister's birthday is ten days before his and she got one. He loved it so much and tried bouncing on hers but she has a smaller one as she is only three, so I had to rush order one for him. They LOVE it and have a great time bouncing around the house. When the weather permits, they'll be out in the yard to bounce. Color is just as shown, easy to blow up, and seems to be quite sturdy with enough give to give them a nice big bounce.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: boy loves it ,wife hates it
customer_reviews.text: the boy rides it so much the wife wont let him ride it when he is around her ,that constand bong bong of the thing hitting the floor drives her crazy but he loves it and would be on it 24 hours a day if he could ,one of the greatest values i ever got
customer_reviews.author: rotator

customer_reviews.title: Good Energy Sucker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old son when we were home in quarantine. Its been great fun for him to bounce around and throw at the wall in his room (when Mom's not looking, of course). It does tend to lose air, so I need to blow it back up sooner than I had hoped, but otherwise, its good.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Brucks

customer_reviews.title: Just right for 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I checked the reviews on sizes for these balls. Got this for my six year old and it’s just right. This may be too small for a seven year old or older as it states it’s intended for. My son weighs about 54 pounds and is about 46-47” tall.
customer_reviews.author: Emily MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Really fun cute emoji face
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves this hopper ball. He has so much fun bouncing everywhere. I tried it also and it’s big enough for a 5’7” adult. It’s fun I’m sure we will get another when this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Your children will LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: Very thick and well made, holds air well and comes with a patch and a pump. Easy to pump up. My 5 year old LOVES his and uses it inside and outside. It's his fav mode of transportation.
customer_reviews.author: Shandra

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my nephew and hw loved them. My cousins come over and they love bouncing on them as well. They hold up outside on the concrete, too. The ball was easy to blow up with the pump it came with. The plug did break off in the ball so i was glad it came with 2 plugs. The broken off piece is still inside the ball, so not sure if it will pop a hole in the ball. We are satisfied with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristinalynn

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 of these for Christmas 2 are great but 1 has a slow leak. The the nozzle on the one that has a slow leak has a defection. Need to exchange It! Otherwise kids have had alot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Santiz

customer_reviews.title: Very well made. Sturdy and FUN.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 7 year old grandson. He has older siblings and they all love this hoppy ball. :) My daughter said this is the favorite gift of all the gifts. She is impressed with the quality too. I think I need to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them.
customer_reviews.text: We have two of the Waliki hop balls now. Kids love them. They have help up great despite what my kids do to them. Many others have not been so lucky. May they rest in pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Ain't Nobody Got Time For That

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it, and has endless fun bouncing everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Takes too long to inflate with the hand pump. Good thing I had a air mattress inflator with the pointed nozzle part. We. Will use the hand pump just for refilling when it gets a little low. It says adult size, but it’s the prefect size for my 6 year old granddaughter. It could probably be inflated to fit a full grown man or woman, but I’m not sure.
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We got this a couple years ago at Christmas, I never wrote a review, it was easy to inflate in we started with the smallest adult lol testing it out flying up-and-down the Hall lol even big mama took it for a go, it did not pop lol we had so much fun
customer_reviews.author: Mary B. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Will loose some air, but great fun and exercise!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this ball! It provides some great exercise and has held up well. It does loose air, so be prepared to pump it up a bit before each use. I've used it as well with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Good Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Item was received on time. It is the perfecr size for my 7 yr old. Seems of quality material, heavy sturdy plastic. However, my plug broke off inside the bouncer itself. Hoping it lasts at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Paolucci

customer_reviews.title: Popped in two months
customer_reviews.text: Got this on March 8 it is now may 15. So only had for about 2 months and it popped...my autistic son is not only beyond sad but it scared him. States it's for teenagers. My son is 8 and weighs 52 lbs. Not exactly cheap in price either.. .
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Shamberger

customer_reviews.title: Ok product but not heavy duty enough for extended use
customer_reviews.text: What my kids disliked the most of this product was the useless, flimsy handle. I used to love these as a kid and remember the ones we used to use had a very sturdy, non-deforming handle for control. These handles deform easy and make it hard to control the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love this guy! Bought some for a youth camp we were doing. They were made great and came in a timely manner. We had big guys and small guys jumping on these things and they held up without popping. We were outside in the grass as well. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a big hit for grandson who needs exercise for getting out energy & stress. Made well & really has been a great activity for him. Easy to use & safe to use in house.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to give these to my grandchildren for Christmas, I ordered 3 in different colors and sizes. The one I ordered for my oldest grandson was supposed to be green, instead I got a pink one and he won't play with it. The pink one that i did order for my granddaughter in the much smaller size didn't come with the pump. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tanyax2

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: We got a smaller size for my daughter not thinking our 11 yo would also like one. After listening to the arguments we ordered this bigger size for my son. He loves it! Really fun toy!
customer_reviews.author: cacherm

customer_reviews.title: Good producc
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He is on the autism spectrum and it helps him when he on sensory overload.
customer_reviews.author: liz m

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: We thought this could be a good way to exercise indoors during the pandemic. The ball popped literally thirty seconds after we blew it up and my son bounced on it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Rossell

customer_reviews.title: Buy one..  better than video games
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bouncy ball... all the kids have a lot it energy, so this ball is perfect for him, it keep them jumping and doing exercises all day..
customer_reviews.author: Pedro kuang

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and easy to inflate. Fun for a variety of ages.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this purchase. I bought it for my 6 year old as some rebound type therapy in the house when he’s rambunctious. It’s been really fun, durable and entertains for ages 4-11 and it has held up.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size large for my 8 year old son. At first I thought it was a little small but the size actually is great for his height right now. He is a tall 8 year old. He loves it! Great quality and would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Warning
customer_reviews.text: The ball smelled horrible. We had to inflate it outside and leave it there for a few days to air out. I don't know what chemicals they use to produce this bouncy ball but we set it on our dining room chair and when I went to get it, it had stuck to the back of the chair. It pulled off the paint from the chair. This was a high end chair that was in perfect condition. Not sure I want to keep my hands on something that is loaded with chemicals that leach out.
customer_reviews.author: KrisK

customer_reviews.title: Hopper Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun for the kids (age 9 and 11) - they bounce around aimlessly, sit on them while they are watching movies or on the computer. A bicycle pump is necessary but we haven't had to re-inflate them since Christmas morning and they've had lots of bouncing since then. They are a big hit with the kid's friends when they are visiting too - there is just something inviting about a big bouncy ball with the handle.
customer_reviews.author: C. Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Fun Factor is up and up 👍
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to inflate but once done it is a sturdy and durable product. My son enjoys playing with this toy. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: M. Panes

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: so cute and lots of fun. Didn't take long to inflate!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great item for smaller children
customer_reviews.text: These balls are very sturdy and can withstand a lot of action! We purchased some for our After-School Program and found that our K-1st grade kids really enjoy this size. When inflated it's nice for them, but some of our kids said it was too low. So I would recommend this for older pre-schoolers and shorter K and 1st graders.
customer_reviews.author: SLowe

customer_reviews.title: Fun and great product!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves her ball. She loves to do relays with her sister and her mom!
customer_reviews.author: Clever

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this!
customer_reviews.text: This bouncing ball is really great! It seems very sturdy, and it seems like it will last a really long time. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t love hoppy balls?
customer_reviews.text: It seems very well made. Love the color and emoji face on it. So far it has been a hit. It is bigger than one we had in past so the older kids love it to bounce on and the younger kids push it around like a giant ball.
customer_reviews.author: S Wiilis

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandchildren, boys ages 5 & 8. I watched them have a blast bouncing inside the house. The boys were rough with them. I bought two, so I assume the balls are tough.
customer_reviews.author: kathy g

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: This made one ten year old thrilled! I gave this to my nephew as a Christmas present and he immediately began jumping on it. He's really enjoyed it. These are made if a thick plastic/rubber material and they're quite sturdy. I used a compressor to air it up though. The hand tool they send isn't too bad but I bought a couple of them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a find. This was the hit of Christmas for grandson. I would totally recommend this for boys or girls 6 and up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Strong and fun! I had one of these growing up and now my grandson gets to experience the fun! He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Bouncy 5yr old
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 5 year old for Christmas after he played with a much cheaper version at a friends house. This hopper ball is fantastic quality and such a nice size.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia K

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift for Christmas -- if was a big hit for a little boy who doesn't really love to be active.
customer_reviews.author: Lis

customer_reviews.title: She absolutely loved it. In fact her 9 year old sister ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old granddaughter's birthday. She absolutely loved it. In fact her 9 year old sister loved playing on it as well. I think we now need to get another one for her. Great fun. The pump works well but I think it would be easier to fill it up at a full service gas station.
customer_reviews.author: SB gma

customer_reviews.title: Kids favorite gift
customer_reviews.text: Kids favorite holiday gift. Couldn't believe how much they loved it and still use it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Saldua

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor active play
customer_reviews.text: One of ours popped but they were quick to send a replacement. My kids love them! They are great for bad weather days when your kids are stuck inside. They can bounce all of their extra energy out.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: It's fun
customer_reviews.text: Big it does take awhile to air up use compressor.
customer_reviews.author: The shopper

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: This has been tons of fun for my 7 year old. It has held up well despite being used as a trampoline squished between couches, so I’d give it 6 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew and Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these in three sizes for the whole family. What a riot it was seeing everyone jump around! They are easy to inflate with the hand pump, but use an electric pump, such as for an air mattress if you have a lot to fill and your arm is getting tired. They are very robust so far, and everyone has enjoyed bouncing around.
customer_reviews.author: Dena C.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought these to our 13 grandkids this year! Various colors snd some with emoji faces too! They were such a hit! From 2 - 20 years old! They all loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Amakimi

customer_reviews.title: Every child should have one!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun! Children loved bouncing all over the place! Great buy and made a hit at the party!!
customer_reviews.author: Regina C. Timmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! My 7 year old loves this. It is large and has a great bounce to it. He could play on this for hours if it didnt give him such a great workout (pro for parents-great energy release). The pump is easy to operate, and the color and picture is vibrant. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Escalante

customer_reviews.title: My 8 year old uses it CONSTANTLY & LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: It seems like such a simple thing, but it's such great exercise! My 8 year old just loves hopping on his bouncy ball to take a break ... after school... in between homework... after dinner. The 1st one I bought wasn't staying inflated. I wrote to the company & they said that's very unusual. They immediately sent me a replacement & it's perfect. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved this
customer_reviews.text: So much fun was had on this ball on Christmas morning, so many calories burnt off small active children while we relaxed, and it was also so quiet on the tile floors! No squeaks or noise! Really strong and quiet!
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan Whaley

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if the one we got was just defective or if the overall quality is just poor. The very first time my granddaughter bounced on it, it popped. It was inflated per the instructions. So much for a fun Christmas present!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Nonverbal five-year-old
customer_reviews.text: Nonverbal five-year-old Enjoys this very much nice for motor skills , Going to buy his brother one ,,
customer_reviews.author: Kay T Emma

customer_reviews.title: Fun for All
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my kids for Christmas and they have had so much fun with them. They are getting a decent workout without even realizing it because they are having so much fun jumping around on them racing or playing chicken We we will be getting an adult version of the hopper ball for me and a friend so we can play with the kids
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: fun and easy
customer_reviews.text: So far this is a hit with the kids. We got it for a five year old and it is the right size still with a little room to grow. Super easy to pump up.
customer_reviews.author: Gold Kitten

customer_reviews.title: Great for 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: Hoping this will help curb winter energy when we can't get outside. Both my 7 year old and 3 year old were bouncing around Christmas day.
customer_reviews.author: Alli S.

customer_reviews.title: Let's get bouncing.!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 yr old grandson. Glad I bought the bigger size one. It fits him well. He likes it ok. It seems to be a good product so far. It's sturdy n doesn't leak any air. He'll love it once he masters his bouncing skills. I'm glad I got it for him. He is very energetic. Fun toy for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: scooby doo in LA

customer_reviews.title: Endless fun, size was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My 6yo loves this ball, she is a little tall for her age and the size details in the description made it perfect to order the right one.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Alley

customer_reviews.title: I bought numerous sizes of these as Christmas gifts - ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought numerous sizes of these as Christmas gifts - for everyone from adults to an 18 mo old. The kids begged to have them blown up as soon as they opened them and they hopped all over the house the whole evening; even the adults were hopping around. These were the hit of Christmas day!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't pop. Bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: TL:DR We call this guy Fat Mexican and he never pops. We've put this ball through hell, and it never pops. We bounce as much, balance as much as we want and it won't pop.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toy!!!
customer_reviews.text: He absolutely loves this thing!!!! Bought this for my 5 y/o son and it says it is for 7-9 year olds, but if we would have gotten a smaller one I don't think he would have enjoyed it as much. ??? He may have. But this one seems to be the right size for my little turkey man. :)
customer_reviews.author: Syble Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love the Hopper Balls
customer_reviews.text: Love the Hopper Balls. They have kept air in them for six months! I bought them for Easter and had the grandkids collect their eggs by jumping on the balls. They had a blast. Very good quality. The kids were eight and nine.
customer_reviews.author: peggy grant

customer_reviews.title: Fun times
customer_reviews.text: Great toy but I think the age/size is a little off. I got the 20 inch ball intended for 7-9 year olds for my daughters 6th birthday. She's a lean 47" and 49 pounds. She's able to use it but I think it fits my 41", 37 pound 4 year old better. I think well be ordering another and getting the 22" teenager size.
customer_reviews.author: A Smith

customer_reviews.title: If you are considering this, I say get it! Its great!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! He is not a tiny boy, and this ball does great for him, very durable.
customer_reviews.author: jessi

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bounce ball, he uses it daily weather to just sit on to bounce on. He's a very active 10yr old and it withstands his daily use of it.
customer_reviews.author: MrsBratten

customer_reviews.title: love! my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: love! my son loves it. easy assembly and seems durable. I got it for my almost 5 year old and he is on the smaller end for it but still works. I noticed some people had trouble pumping it up....you have to take out the plug to pump it up, then replace when done
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Been 2 years since we purchased this item and it still is going strong. Excellent quality..
customer_reviews.author: Harry Potter

customer_reviews.title: You won't be sorry
customer_reviews.text: This was my daughter's favorite Christmas present of all!!! She is on it constantly!!! Great way for her a 6 year old to release some extra energy on rainy days. I also use it for one of my physical therapy exercises 😀👍👍 very much with every reasonable penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Bray

customer_reviews.title: Broke and Fragile
customer_reviews.text: Used it the first day outside. Hand some acorns on the ground. It broke within the first 30 min used on a paved surface. It was broken by an acorn. Very dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! He will sit on it and bounce all day if I let him! Very easy to blow up and it even comes with its own pump. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Aleah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bouncy Ball!
customer_reviews.text: Great bouncy ball for 4-7 year olds. Strong material and well made. Purchased 2 for my grandson and granddaughter. They are still bouncing all over. Thank you, Trisha..
customer_reviews.author: Trisha McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Who is having more fun? Me or the kids?
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old girls love this - well lets be honest here, I love it too! We bought two and are having such fun racing around the yard. Be careful, flying off is inevitable! This has taken some abuse from my bouncing all over the place and held up nicely. Great fun!
customer_reviews.author: ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Great and fun Hopper ball
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun! My son loved it! Very sturdy and bouncy. He is 4 ft tall. Great for his size.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Manson Chavez

customer_reviews.title: fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Works great, the kids love it. I wish it had a one way air valve.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen M

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy. My kids 9 & 7 love bouncing on it for hours together.
customer_reviews.author: Sarith Reuben

customer_reviews.title: Ball was great but after a few times same day playing with ...
customer_reviews.text: Ball was great but after a few times same day playing with it product seem to deflate easily and had to be pumped up a lot So it's frustrating for a small child when have to stop bouncing to keep pumping it up But overall a fun product especially for a spd ADHD kiddo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, active fun
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these and the kids love them. They are super fun and surprisingly strong. We've had one of them over a year and it's never had a hole or even a small leak and they are used almost daily (though we don't use them outside).
customer_reviews.author: M. Grunig

customer_reviews.title: Great motivator
customer_reviews.text: I love this item, my grandson needs to exercise more and this ball has got him going
customer_reviews.author: Non

customer_reviews.title: 9 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son is super happy with it and bounces all around the house, showing me how high and far he can travel.
customer_reviews.author: A. Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold air after initial inflation.
customer_reviews.text: We loved these at first and the air stayed in great. But when we tried to inflate them more the air leaked out-even after numerous tries and making sure the plug was inserted properly. We never took them outside so I am sure there is not a hole. They were great while they lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Natali B.

customer_reviews.title: Great hopper for 10 yrs old and small adult
customer_reviews.text: We bought 22 inches WALIKI TOYS Hopper Ball For Teenagers Ages 10-15. It doesn't have any unpleasant smell. It took us a few minutes to pump it up with the provided hand pump. My son has enjoyed hopping up and down on it. He is 52'' tall.
customer_reviews.author: Falls Church VA

customer_reviews.title: Continue physical therapy at home
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson. He is autistic and developmentally delayed. He loves this bouncer. The only bad thing is sometimes he gets to be too much of a daredevil while playing with it :) Another plus is he uses a similar one at physical therapy so it was already familiar to him.
customer_reviews.author: janene salazar

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to exercise
customer_reviews.text: Excellent way to get your child’s exercising. I would only caution to check the size of the ball. Make sure it’s within the age range of the child .
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Delehanty

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love a hippity hop?
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves this. He is 48" and probably would have preferred a larger hippity hop but I purchased it based on online recommendations. All in all the kids love it and it gets used. Great for building core muscles which lead to better posture, improved writing and reading.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannag

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong size / pump didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present for my nephew. Found out a month later the wrong size was delivered and that the pump never worked. They thought this is what i had purchased for him. Had I known, I would of returned.
customer_reviews.author: 3boys15

customer_reviews.title: It fits 10-15 year olds but I doubt they will use it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality hopper but my grandson who is 12 years old, is just not into it. All my younger grandchildren, however love theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Ambrosino

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than the a yellow
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit. smaller than the yellow one we had. Kid was disappointed (11 years old). Otherwise we use it to sit/bounce while watching TV. Especially with being stuck at home the kids are doing something with them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kalina Doudova

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very happy with the thickness and durability of this item!!! My 3.5 yo loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hopper ball is great! I got this for my 12 year old for Christmas. I had bought the exact same ball for his 9 year old brother 6 months ago and my 12 year old wanted one too. Great quality, no problems with them losing air at all. And they also like to sit on them while playing on the Xbox One!
customer_reviews.author: Penny Z

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old son LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! My 4 year old son LOVES THIS! I suggest measuring your child because the age is not always spot on. This fits my son perfectly and he has not stopped playing with it since we got it!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Son is 9 and loves it. Bought one for my 11 year old in an adult size bc she wanted one too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Boy loves it
customer_reviews.text: On outgrew his old one. Found this as a replacement. Seemed a little "thin", but he hasn't destroyed it yet (only used indoors). It doesn't come with a pump, so if you don't have one, you will have to purchase one
customer_reviews.author: Laurelhighlander

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My kid been hoping on it every day for months and so far it still looks like new. Great fun to burn that extra energy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For an ADULT size hopper this is pretty small. I would say this i smore like ...
customer_reviews.text: For an ADULT size hopper this is pretty small. I would say this i smore like pre-teen size. I was disappointed. It's still fun and love the face, but it was given to the boss as a gift, and it'd be nice if it were larger.
customer_reviews.author: C. Matamoros

product_meta.title: WALIKI Hopper Ball for Kids 7-9 | Hippity Hop Ball | Jumping Hopping Ball | Therapy Ball | Green 20"
product_meta.description:
WALIKI’S HOPPER BALL (also known as Bouncy Ball with handles, Kangaroo Bouncer, Hopping Ball, Hoppity Hop, Sit & Bounce, Jumping Ball) 
Give your children a Hop Ball and watch them go! Thicker and more durable than other generic brands on amazon, our Hopper Balls are a fabulously fun way for kids to exercise without even knowing it. We guarantee children will burn off their extra energy and parents will enjoy watching the action. Free double-action pump included. 

 Go all the way
Try an adult size Hippity Hop & bounce with your child. Why? We think adults deserve to have fun too! And because we can. Not a time travel machine. 

 Birthday parties
If you think one child bouncing is fun, imagine an entire birthday party bouncing together, and each child taking a ball home as a party favor. That’s exciting! 

 Not just for fun 
WALIKI’s extensive toy line is used in kindergartens and schools to stimulate creativity, movement and exercise. 
Therapists enlist our Hopping Balls as a therapy ball for kids, a toy for autistic children and a fine-motor improvement tool ADHD toy. 

 So much Fun 
Professionals have many uses for the Hop Ball but we make it with FUN in mind, kids all over the world love them! There is a video of people jumping in over 40 countries. 

 Safety 
Waliki’s bouncy toys are designed with love in Miami, Florida, and made with care in PRC. The plug is a small part so children under 3 should have adult supervision. They conform to ASTM-F963 toy safety standard. 

 Keep the kids happy and entertained with Waliki’s colorful and cool Jumping Balls! 

 Waliki Toys, based in Florida, was inspired by a wonderful grandmother. Our goal is to keep children happy, busy and healthy by making exercise fun. We produce a huge range of ride on bouncy toys, bounce houses, and are proud resellers of Rody Horse, which is made by Gymnic.
feature_bullets: PERFECT SIZE: Waliki's 20"/50CM Hopper Ball is the right size to MAKE EXERCISE FUN for kids ages 7-9
EASY TO INFLATE: A Double-action hand pump is included. Inflate your Hopping Ball in under 5 minutes
SAFE & DURABLE: The Jumping Ball is safety tested to US safety & phthalates standards
WE READ YOUR MIND: Parents deserve fun too! Spoil yourself with an adult size Sit & Bounce Ball
WALIKI TOYS: Since 2005 smart parents trust our glorious bouncing toys that MAKE EXERCISE FUN

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars489 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
